rushfiles_file_added: A user added a file to RushFiles in a project
rushfiles_file_removed: A user removed a file from RushFiles in a project
rushfiles_file_updated: A user updated a file in RushFiles in a project
rushfiles_folder_created: A user created a folder in RushFiles in a project
rushfiles_folder_selected: A user linked a RushFiles folder to a project
rushfiles_node_authorized: A user authorized the RushFiles addon for a project
rushfiles_node_deauthorized: A user deauthorized the RushFiles addon for a project
rushfiles_node_deauthorized_no_user: RushFiles addon for a project deauthorized
